picked_headlines.summary: DINO-YOLO boosts object detection in civil engineering with self-supervised learning, enhancing data efficiency.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: This article highlights a significant advancement in engineering applications, showcasing how AI can improve efficiency in real-world scenarios.

picked_headlines.summary: Glia autonomously designs systems using LLMs, offering insights that surpass human experts.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: Glia represents a breakthrough in AI-driven system design, providing a compelling case for stakeholders interested in cutting-edge technology applications.

digest:
- *Fine-Tuning Open Video Generators* enhances video production efficiency with small datasets, crucial for media and entertainment. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.27364)
- *SageAttention3* introduces FP4 Tensor Cores for efficient attention, promising speedups in AI model training. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2505.11594)
- *KAT-Coder* improves coding with LLMs, making it a valuable tool for software developers. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.18779)
- *SpecAttn* optimizes sparse attention in LLMs, reducing cache accesses and maintaining quality. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.27641)
- *VeriMoA* enhances HDL generation with a multi-agent framework, improving RTL design efficiency. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.27617)
- *EnterpriseBench* evaluates LLMs in enterprise settings, revealing low task completion rates, a concern for business applications. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.27287)
- *LLINK* improves cross-lingual alignment in LLMs, beneficial for low-resource language processing. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.27254)
- *Visual Backdoor Attacks* highlights security risks in MLLM agents, emphasizing the need for robust AI security measures. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.27623)
- *TempoPFN* introduces a linear RNN for zero-shot time series forecasting, outperforming existing methods. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.25502)
- *Mamba-Transformer Hybrids* offers insights into memory use, enhancing language model performance. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.26912)
- *Universal Video Retrieval* framework improves video embedding generalization, crucial for media retrieval systems. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.27571)
- *Adaptive Data Flywheel* enhances AI agent accuracy and reduces latency through continuous learning. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.27051)
